trans-unit.source: Represents a mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en enhet med musen.

trans-unit.source: The MouseDevice supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: MouseDevice støtter det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: For mouse related input, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class.
trans-unit.target: For musen relatert angi, må du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class represents the mouse to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen representerer musen til et program, og inneholder metoder, egenskaper og hendelser som gjenspeiler statusen for musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterer inndata for denne enheten.

trans-unit.source: The source of input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for inndata for denne enheten.

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse events to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer musen hendelser til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.
trans-unit.target: Når et element fanger musen, den mottar musen inndata om markøren er innenfor grensene Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>ikke er angitt, standard <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>er <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call Capture passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil frigjøre musen capture kall Capture sending `null` som elementet til capture.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Hvis musen fanges når en <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>denne hendelsen oppstår og inndataene er ikke skal elementet under musen, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>aktiveres først.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for elementet opphentede mulighet til å frigjøre capture før den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>hendelser skal rutes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Elementet til å ta musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet kunne capture musen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer musen inndata til det angitte elementet ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Når et element fanger musen, mottar musen inndataene hvorvidt markøren er innenfor grensene.

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil frigjøre musen capture, kan du kalle <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>Kast `null` som elementet til capture.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Hvis musen fanges når en <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>denne hendelsen oppstår og inndataene er ikke skal elementet under musen, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>aktiveres først.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for elementet opphentede mulighet til å frigjøre capture før den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>hendelser skal rutes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse..
trans-unit.target: Elementet til å ta musen..

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: Innhenting av policyen for å bruke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet kunne capture musen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: captureMode is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: captureModeer ikke et gyldig .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som blir registrert av musen.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Når et element fanger musen, mottar musen inndataene hvorvidt markøren er innenfor grensene.

trans-unit.source: The element which is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som hentes av musen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the mouse pointer is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet musepekeren holdes over direkte.

trans-unit.source: The mouse is considered directly over an element if the mouse has been captured to that element.
trans-unit.target: Musen anses direkte over et element Hvis musen har blitt lagret til dette elementet.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be composed of multiple elements.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kan bestå av flere elementer.

trans-unit.source: DirectlyOver reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself.
trans-unit.target: DirectlyOver rapporter bestemte elementet i den sammensatte kontrollen musepekeren holdes over og ikke selve kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> the pointer is over, the DirectlyOver property could report the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel avhengig av hvilken del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>pekeren er over, egenskapen DirectlyOver kan rapportere den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>egenskap i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>og <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>å finne ut om musen er over et element som inneholder de visuelle underordnede elementene eller kontrollere sammensetting elementer.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element the mouse pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: Elementet musepekeren holdes over.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the specified mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den angitte museknappen.

trans-unit.source: The button which is being queried.
trans-unit.target: -Knappen som som spørres.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Beregner plasseringen av pekeren, i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av pekeren, i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Beregner plasseringen av pekeren, i klienten koordinater, i den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source in which to obtain the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden du vil hente posisjon for musen.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av pekeren, i klienten koordinater, i den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: Henter posisjon for musen i forhold til et angitt element.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av musepekeren er beregnet i forhold til den angitte <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>med øvre venstre hjørne av elementet som nullpunktet, 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>

trans-unit.source: The frame of reference in which to calculate the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Referansen i skal beregnes plasseringen av musen.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av musen i forhold til parameteren relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is or is not a or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois or is not a or .

trans-unit.source: Calculates the screen position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Beregner skjermen posisjonen for pekeren.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av pekeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the left mouse button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for museknappen for denne enheten med musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the middle button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for den midterste knappen på enheten musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir markør for hele programmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> that OverrideCursor is set to will be applied to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>som OverrideCursor vil gjelde for hele programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To clear the override <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, set OverrideCursor to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Slik fjerner overstyringen <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, WantDestinationQueue OverrideCursor `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: Setting OverrideCursor to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A> will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.
trans-unit.target: Angi OverrideCursor til <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>vil tvinge pekeren ikke som skal vises, men musen hendelser behandles fremdeles.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>

trans-unit.source: The override cursor or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if OverrideCursor is not set.
trans-unit.target: Override markøren eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis OverrideCursor ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the right button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den høyre knappen på enheten musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Angir pekeren til den angitte<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Note that this cursor does not apply any particular <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, but rather it applies to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne markøren ikke en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, men i stedet det gjelder for hele programmet.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.
trans-unit.target: Markøren skal angis for pekeren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse cursor is set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis pekeren er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger musen for å synkronisere på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> monitors layout changes and calls Synchronize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>skjermer oppsett endringer og kaller synkronisering.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: There are cases in which the mouse input system must be forced to update for it to respond to changes.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes tilfeller der musen inndata systemet tvinges til å oppdatere til den svarer på endringer.

trans-unit.source: For example, you must resynchronize the mouse on a timer.
trans-unit.target: Du må for eksempel synkronisere musen på en tidtaker.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the input from this mouse device is sent to.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som inndata fra enheten musen er sendt til.

trans-unit.source: The target for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> is the object the mouse is over or the object with mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Målet for en <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>objektet musen er over eller objekt med musen capture.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that receives the input.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som mottar inndataene.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse cursor to update.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger pekeren til å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the first extended button on this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den første utvidede knappen på denne enheten med musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den andre utvidede knappen på enheten musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for knappen.
